quote: Calmness is the cradle of power
author: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Stress should be a powerful driving force, not an obstacle
author: Bill Phillips

quote: To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan and not quite enough time.
author: Leonard Bernstein

quote: It’s not stress that kills us, it’s our reaction to it.
author: Hans Selye

quote: We must understand that sadness is an ocean, and sometimes we drown, while other days we are forced to swim
author: R.M. Drake

quote: Experiencing sadness and anger can make you feel more creative, and by being creative you can get beyond your pain or negativity.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer
